#summary Java application

= Car Renta - Java application =

This java application include:<br>
*entities*: Car, Customer, Lease<br>
*managers*: Car Manager (Impl) , Customer Manager (Impl), Lease Manager (Impl)<br>



==Car==
attributes: _id (Long), pricePerDay (Big Decimal), numberPlate (String)_

==Customer==
attributes: _id (Long), phone (String), lastName (String), firstName (String)_

==Lease==
attributes: _fromDate (Date), id (Long), toDate (Date), car (Car), realReturn (Date), customer (Customer)_

==Car Manager==
methods: _createCar, updateCar, deleteCar, findCarById, findAllCars_
<ul>
<li>
====Create Car====
attributes: _Car_
return value: _void_
Adding the car into the manager.</li>

<li>
====Update Car====
attributes: _Car_
return value: _void_
Updating the car in the manager.</li>

<li>
====Delete Car====
attributes: _Car_
return value: _void_
Deleting the car from the manager.</li>

<li>
====Find Car By Id====
attributes: _Long_
return value: _Car_
Finding the car by the Id.</li>


<li>
====Find All Cars====
attributes: _void_
return value: _List (Car)_
Finding all cars.</li>
</ul>

==Customer Manager==
methods: _createCustomer, updateCustomer, deleteCustomer, findCustomerById, findAllCustomers, findCustomerByName_
<ul>
<li>
====Create Customer====
attributes: _Customer_
return value: _void_
Adding the customer into the manager.</li>

<li>
====Update Customer====
attributes: _Customer_
return value: _void_
Updating the customer in the manager.</li>

<li>
====Delete Customer====
attributes: _Customer_
return value: _void_
Deleting the customer from the manager.</li>

<li>
====Find Customer By Id====
attributes: _Long_
return value: _Customer_
Finding the customer by the Id.</li>


<li>
====Find All Customers====
attributes: _void_
return value: _List (Customer)_
Finding all customers.</li>
</ul>

<li>
====Find Customer By Name====
attributes: _Long_
return value: _Customer_
Finding the customer by the name.</li>

==Lease Manager==
methods: _createLease, updateLease, unLeasedCars, findLeaseByCustomer, lastMonthProfit_
